name: Bound By The Moon
description:
In the year 20XX, Japan was ambushed by a Yokai uprising which brought about an endless night full of darkness and malice. The great moon god Tsukuyomi trapped by the perpetual shroud, sent out two heroes to slay the Yokai and bring back the daylight. A samurai and a ninja, bound both by duty and the power of the moon, must fight together to save the world.

Made for GMTK-2021
